successes.title: Matchstick - The Streaming Stick Built on Firefox OS
successes.description: Matchstick, the first HDMI stick based on Firefox OS, is the best way to experience your favorite movies, music, and games on your HDTV

Pledges.description: Help Support OPEN - we are trying to build a new platform to prepare for the explosion of streaming video to the home. Netflix is half of all Internet traffic (crazy), and all the content owners are hopping on board. We want to create an ecosystem built on open hardware and software so its easy for anybody to get to this great content, anytime, anywhere, without one of the "big guys" imposing their rules on who gets what, when, or where. Help us out with a small donation!
Early Bird - One Matchstick. Help us get started! These will also be the first units to ship. Retail price will be $25. Free shipping in the United States, add $5 for international shipping.
The Basic - One Matchstick. Retail price will be $25. Free shipping in the United States, add $5 for international shipping.

Developer Unit - One Matchstick from our early batch of prototype units for developers. Includes access to all SDKs and APIs, and developer support from the Matchstick team. Includes free shipping in the United States, add $5 for international shipping.
The 2-Pack - Two Matchsticks. The perfect bundle for two rooms, or use one when you travel! Free shipping in the United States, add $5 for international shipping.
One for me, One for four more - Five Matchsticks makes sharing easy! Free shipping in the United States, add $5 for international shipping.
Hooking Up The Dorm  - Ten Matchsticks, perfect for the dorm, the office, or the sales team. Free shipping in the United States, add $10 for international shipping.

The Ultimate CES Package - a trip for you and a guest to the 2015 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas built by a team who knows how to do CES right! We'll fly you in on Monday the 5th and stay through Thursday the 8th. We'll put you up at the Venetian (Dbl Occupancy), get you passes for the show, give you $200 a day to pay for stuff, take you to an amazing dinner with the team, and get you to a show one night (a good one). Then the gear, we'll ship you four Matchsticks and a bunch of Matchstick swag (shirts, hoodies, etc.)
